step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together in this first step.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you bring your hands up.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch for 30 seconds is great. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
You're returning to the start position smoothly. Ensure you maintain control throughout the entire movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Keep focusing on keeping your elbows close when you raise your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to hold steady and avoid leaning forward.
